title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Chiang Mai, Thailand
content:
Photo submitted by Kit Jiirin, “Starting winter season in Chiang Mai, the heaven city of Cyclists.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the Pic Of The Day. Send in your pics with a description here.

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Chiang Mai, Thailand appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
